name: miniod
description:
Minio on DC/OS 

Documentation: https://docs.mesosphere.com/services/minio 

It is customizable and not guarunteed to work with every version of MinioS, use at your own risk. 
 Updated: 26 Feb 2020.
preInstallNotes: Default configuration requires 4 agent nodes each with: 2 CPU | 252 MB MEM | 1 200 MB Disk.
